entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:44 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:44 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
